name: Absolute Zero
description: Keep the cold temperature steady to heal allies.

weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

weaponEffects.title: Frost Benediction
weaponEffects.description: Increase the entire team's frost ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is active.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the staff to attack **5** times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **59.8%** of ATK plus **359**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **44.9%** of ATK plus **270**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **72.2%** of ATK plus **433**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **98.7%** of ATK plus **592**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **174.2%** of ATK plus **1045**.

normals.name: Soaring Barrage
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack **5** times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **77.6%** of ATK plus **465**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **55.9%** of ATK plus **336**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **60.6%** of ATK plus **364**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **109%** of ATK plus **655**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **113.5%** of ATK plus **681**.

normals.name: Moonfall
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Moonfall.
Upon landing, deal damage once every **0.2** seconds, for a total of **136.2%** of ATK plus **817** damage.

normals.name: Focused Assault
normals.description:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming **300** points of endurance.
First Attack: Pull in enemies in front of the user, **strongly suspending** them and deal damage equal to **38.4%** of ATK plus **230** every **0.3** seconds (up to **4** times).
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **44.4%** of ATK plus **266** at the target location and to nearby enemies every **0.3** seconds.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: **15** seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Surge
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Surge.
Each energy pulse deals damage equal to **45.9%** of ATK plus **275** to targets.
Grant **75** weapon charge points upon use.

dodge.name: Tesseract
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Evasive Blast.
Fire an energy orb forward, dealing damage equal to **66.4%** of ATK plus **398** to targets in its path every **0.3** seconds (up to **5** times).
Grant **75** weapon charge points upon use.

skill.name: Sanctuary
skill.description: Create a healing zone that moves with the Wanderer and heals nearby allies for **95%** of ATK plus **570** once every **0.5** seconds for **6** seconds. **60**-second cooldown.

discharge.name: Swift Deliverance
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, plus heals nearby Wanderers and allies for **118.8%** of ATK plus **713** HP for **7** seconds.

advancements.description: After dodging, summon a healing bee that follows the user and heals the ally with the lowest percentage of HP within **15** meters. Heal for **25%** of ATK and restore **50** weapon charge points each time, lasts for **25** seconds. Cooldown: **25** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.

Use **Sanctuary** or discharge skills to remove debuffs from targets, can be used while being affected by control effects. Increase shatter and damage dealt for all teammates within range by **20%**, and grant them immunity to control effects and shatter.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
Increase healing effect by **15%**, plus an additional **20%** when healing targets with less than **60%** HP.

Whenever a healing bee is summoned or disappears from battle, heal all allies for **100%** of the user's ATK. All allies within **10** meters of the healing bee also gain **15%** all damage and healing boost (cannot stack).
